text: Jevha balala janma dila, tevha mhanu lagali, he majhya palanahara! Mala tara mulagi jhali ahe. Allaha cangalya prakare janato ki kaya janmala ghatale ahe ani mulaga mulisarakha nahi. Mi tice nava mariyama thevale ahe. Mi tila va ticya santatila tiraskrta saitana (cya upadrava) pasuna tujhya asrayakhali dete
